Update: default prefs: Make default mountpoint's name depending on codec

This selects the mountpoint name depending on the codec. For Ogg/Vorbis
coolmic.ogg is used, for Ogg/Opus coolmic.opus is selected.

title: Update: default prefs: use a samplerate of 48kHz by default
message:
Update: default prefs: use a samplerate of 48kHz by default

This change happened as Opus requires to run at 48kHz (see Codec specs).
Most target hardware defaults to or at least supports 48kHz sample rate anyway.

title: Merge branch 'libcoolmic-dsp'

title: Feature: Allow passing buffer sizes to sound drivers
message:
Feature: Allow passing buffer sizes to sound drivers

This adds a new parameter 'buffer' to all sound drivers.
This is of type ssize_t. Use -1 for 'I do not care'.

Note: This is API and ABI change. Recompile the entire project!

title: Feature: Added callbacks for thread control ran within thread context
message:
Feature: Added callbacks for thread control ran within thread context

This adds callbacks COOLMIC_SIMPLE_EVENT_THREAD_POST_START and
COOLMIC_SIMPLE_EVENT_THREAD_PRE_STOP which are like
COOLMIC_SIMPLE_EVENT_THREAD_START and COOLMIC_SIMPLE_EVENT_THREAD_STOP
but are run within the thread they are about.

Note: This is a ABI change. You need to recompile the entire project.

title: Fix: Made the OpenSL ES driver working.
message:
Fix: Made the OpenSL ES driver working.

This implements both pageflip logic as well as
synchronization between our thread and the hardware audio driver.
